section.20: The Book of Qiyam Al-Lail (The Night Prayer) and Voluntary Prayers During the Day

hadiths.text: Muhammad bin Al-Muthanna informed us, he said "Muhammad said:Shu'bah narrated to us, he said: I heard Qatadah narrating from Zurarah, from Abdur-Rahman bin Abza, that The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) used to recite in witr: Glorify the Name of your Lord, the Most High
